Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.DBAppointments
  • public class DBAppointments
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DBAppointments()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean addNewAppointment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location, java.lang.Integer contactId, java.lang.String type, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.Integer customerId, java.lang.Integer userId)
      addNewAppointment adds a new appointment to the appointments table, it records userId, customerId, and contactId, etc.
      static Appointments appointmentIn15Min()
      appointmentIn15Min method checks to see if the current user logged in has any upcoming appointments LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: This lambda expression is used here to run a filtered user list "UList" based on getting the currentUserId being equal to the current appointments by UserID for a 15 minutes or less check when the user first logs into the program.
      static boolean deleteAppointment​(int id)
      The deleteCustomer method deletes a selected appointment from the appointments table located on the MainController.
      static boolean deleteAppointmentByCustomer​(int id)
      deleteAppointmentByCustomer checks if the selected user has any existing appointments before Customer Deletion on Main Screen Controller.
      static <Appointments>
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>      		 getAllAppointments()
      This ObservableList returns all the appointments from the appointments table including the Appointment_ID, Title, Description, Location, Type, Start, End, Create_Date, Created_By, Last_Update, Last_Updated_By, Customer_ID, User_ID, Contact_ID.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getContactScheduleByContactId​(int id)
      getContactScheduleByContactId checks if the selected contact has any appointments associated with them then returns those results to the ContactSchedule controller based on selection from the Contact Combo Box
      static boolean updateAppointment​(java.lang.Integer appointment_id, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location, java.lang.Integer contactId, java.lang.String type, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.Integer customerId, java.lang.Integer userId)
      updateAppointment updates an existing appointment to the appointments table, it records userId, customerId, and contactId, etc.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public DBAppointments()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAppointments

        public static <Appointments> javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
        This ObservableList returns all the appointments from the appointments table including the Appointment_ID, Title, Description, Location, Type, Start, End, Create_Date, Created_By, Last_Update, Last_Updated_By, Customer_ID, User_ID, Contact_ID. This is used in conjunction with the models/Appointments.java file that contains the Get methods to be used in the query.
        Type Parameters:
        Appointments - This is a parameter
        Returns:
        This is a return statement

      • appointmentIn15Min

        public static Appointments appointmentIn15Min()
        appointmentIn15Min method checks to see if the current user logged in has any upcoming appointments LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: This lambda expression is used here to run a filtered user list "UList" based on getting the currentUserId being equal to the current appointments by UserID for a 15 minutes or less check when the user first logs into the program.
        Returns:
        This is a return statement
